datasets.doc: A table for storing user terms that are used to refer to external resources.

dtype.doc: The user term that maps to one or more resources in the `resources` table, e.g., "human".
dtype.name: key

datasets.name: keys

datasets.doc: A table for storing object ids of files used in external resources.

dtype.doc: The object id (UUID) of a file that contains objects that refers to external resources.
dtype.name: file_object_id

datasets.name: files

datasets.doc: A table for mapping user terms (i.e., keys) to resource entities.

dtype.doc: The compact uniform resource identifier (CURIE) of the entity, in the form [prefix]:[unique local identifier], e.g., 'NCBI_TAXON:9606'.
dtype.name: entity_id

dtype.doc: The URI for the entity this reference applies to. This can be an empty string. e.g., https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi?mode=info&id=9606
dtype.name: entity_uri

datasets.name: entities

datasets.doc: A table for identifying which objects in a file contain references to external resources.

dtype.doc: The row index to the file in the `files` table containing the object.
dtype.name: files_idx

dtype.doc: The object id (UUID) of the object.
dtype.name: object_id

dtype.doc: The data type of the object.
dtype.name: object_type

dtype.doc: The relative path from the data object with the `object_id` to the dataset or attribute with the value(s) that is associated with an external resource. This can be an empty string if the object is a dataset that contains the value(s) that is associated with an external resource.
dtype.name: relative_path

dtype.doc: The field within the compound data type using an external resource. This is used only if the dataset or attribute is a compound data type; otherwise this should be an empty string.
dtype.name: field

datasets.name: objects

datasets.doc: A table for identifying which objects use which keys.

dtype.doc: The row index to the object in the `objects` table that holds the key
dtype.name: objects_idx

dtype.doc: The row index to the key in the `keys` table.
dtype.name: keys_idx

datasets.name: object_keys

datasets.doc: A table for identifying which keys use which entity.

dtype.doc: The row index to the entity in the `entities` table.
dtype.name: entities_idx

dtype.doc: The row index to the key in the `keys` table.
dtype.name: keys_idx

datasets.name: entity_keys

groups.doc: HDMF External Resources Data Structure. A set of six tables for tracking external resource references in a file or across multiple files.
